column4: Would anyone be able to help a new user trying to insall Ubuntu on a laptop? Just have a quick question
The laptop is an ancient IBM thinkpad, found it in my room. When i boot for the CD I burned, it says the bios is 1999
and ubuntu needs 2000... but then it starts to load, then hangs after a bit on a screen with a cursor
you might want to consider installing Xubuntu. It runs a lot better on low resource machiens.
